data.title: INVITING US INTO HIS RIVERSIDE HOME WITH HUSBAND JOSE BERGERA WAYNE SLEEP REFLECTS ON HIS INCREDIBLE CAREER AS HE TURNS 75 AND SAYS HE HASN'T STOPPED DANCING YET
data.meta_description: Read this exciting story from HELLO! UK July 24, 2023. The wall of Wayne Sleep’s staircase is covered in images from his extraordinary life and career.
data.text:
HELLO! UK

INVITING US INTO HER CHIC BEVERLY HILLS HOME NANCY DAVIS THE OIL HEIRESS AND PHILANTHROPIST ON SHOWING HER CHILDREN HOW TO GIVE BACK

Think of grand Beverly Hills homes tucked away inside gated communities and you may conjure up a show home in which it’s impossible to feel comfortable. Not so in Nancy Davis’s stunning fivebedroom, six-bathroom home in Mulholland Estates.

HELLO! UK

AHEAD OF THEIR MAGNIFICENT WEDDING ANANT AMBANI AND RADHIKA MERCHANT INVITE JUSTIN BIEBER TO SING AT LAVISH PRE-PARTY

For their first spectacular prewedding event, power couple Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant organised performances by Rihanna and magician David Blaine, while Katy Perry and Andrea Bocelli were among the stars who sang at a second celebration.

HELLO! UK

RECEIVING ONE OF THE COUNTRY'S HIGHEST HONOURS DAME SHIRLEY BASSEY GRABS HER CHANCE WITH BOTH HANDS AS SHE IS MADE A COMPANION OF HONOUR BY THE KING

If anyone defines the word “diva”, it’s Dame Shirley Bassey, a star forever associated with high glamour, dramatic performances and a penchant for diamonds.

HELLO! UK

JOINED BY THEIR GOOD FRIEND SERENA WILLIAMS THE DUKE AND DUCHESS OF SUSSEX PRINCE HARRY PAYS TRIBUTE TO THE BOND BETWEEN MOTHERS AND SONS AS HE PICKS UP AWARD

Making her first public appearance in two months, a beaming Duchess of Sussex proudly supported her husband as he was honoured at the 2024 ESPY Awards in Los Angeles.

HELLO! UK

A GLIMPSE BEHIND THE SCENES BUCKINGHAM PALACE NEW GUIDED TOUR SHOWS VISITORS THE VIEW FROM THE MOST FAMOUS BALCONY IN THE WORLD

They are arguably the most famous net curtains in the world and, now, visitors to Buckingham Palace will be able to stand behind them – inside the room that opens onto its famous balcony – for the first time in history.

HELLO! UK

MOVING ON FROM HIS TIME IN THE TARDIS MATT SMITH ON EMBRACING HIS VILLAIN ERA AS THE POISONOUS PRINCE IN 'HOUSE OF THE DRAGON'

Known as one of the most likeable Doctors in Doctor Who, you can’t blame Matt Smith for wanting occasionally to embrace his inner evil.

HELLO! UK

IT'S SUN, SEA AND CELEBS FROM IDAHO TO IBIZA AS THE STARS HEAD TO THE BEACH EVA LONGORIA AND KIM KARDASHIAN LEAD THE A-LIST ENJOYING SUMMER

When the sun comes out, the stars do, too, with a roll call of famous faces hitting the beach for their holidays.

HELLO! UK

SIR KEIR'S STYLISH WIFE LADY STARMER HOW OUR NEW 'FIRST LADY' IS A FASHION VOTE-WINNER

Arriving at Number Ten for the first time in her new role as “First Lady”, Lady Starmer knew her outfit needed to send a message.
